text: The hooks are on both ends, with the push in the middle. Either push the formation or hook and pull, as is appropriate.
Harness the essence of Heaven and Earth to restore the vitality of Yang.
Unit Capacity: Celestal Dragon Demon Slayers %+n
Harness the power of Heaven and Earth through the Wuxing Compass for the use of sorcerers.
Ammunition Capacity: %+n% for all gunpowder units.
Ranged Damage: %+n% for all gunpowder units.
Armor-Piercing Ranged Damage: %+n% for all gunpowder units.
Unit Range: %+n% for all gunpowder units.
The Wuxing War Compass and Wuxing Siege Compass gain "Power of the Wuxing Compass".
Celestial Jinwu Guard, Celestial Dragon Guard, and Nan-Gau Explosive Crossbowmen units gain "Dragon's Tenacity".
Celestal Dragon Guard (Sword Breakers) and Celestal Dragon Guard (Dual Hammers) units gain "Dragon's Bravery".
Jade Longma Crossbowmen, Mounted Jade Crossbowmen, and Nan-Gau Fire Lancers units gain "Dragon's Fierceness".
Thunderbolt Gunners, Golden Crow Handgunners, and Mounted Celestial Dragon Crossbowmen units gain "Dragon's Agility".
All Celestial Dragon Guard units gain "Celestial Formation".
In the midst of ten thousand troops, they grow stronger, as if in an empty field, with the courage to hold off an army single-handedly.
The power of the three axe strokes is immense, but once used up, they have no more tricks.
Fierce and fearless, steadfast and courageous, unafraid in the face of danger.
As unshakable as a mountain, unchanging and steadfast, unyielding and unbreakable.
As fierce as blazing fire, with overwhelming momentum, fearing nothing.
Sharp-eyed, radiant, and penetrating all things.
A powerful formation taught by Yuan Bo, capable of evading arrows from afar and resisting enemies up close.
The experimental crossbow mechanism from Nan-Gau greatly increases firing speed but comes with many problems.
